comment._content: The Departure of the NSW Contingent for the Boer War on Wednesday 17 January 1900. Read all about it - List of soldiers etc - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14241096 'Moravian' description - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14253912 On the Harbour - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14253910
